title: New: R I T U A L – The Fall
body:
Anonymity, gaps between letters, unrevealing artwork… UK outfit **R I T U A L** have it all.

Their debut track, _The Fall_, recalls the likes of James Blake, Rhye and recent Hype Machine favourites HONNE; it’s a beautifully sparse electronic trip through deserted streets. No doubt set to become the latest in a long line of ‘buzzbands’, the group, described by [Complex](http://www.complex.com/music/2014/08/ritual-the-fall-premiere?utm_campaign=complexmusic%2Bsocialflow%2B08%2B2014&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social) as “equal parts videographer, producer, live instrumentalist and singer”, are well and truly onto something rather special. Check out The Fall below, officially released on 1 September, and follow R I T U A L on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RITUAL_MUSIC_).
